mapper.select: select name, diameter, width, height, type, price, car_type from tires inner join car_type on car_type.id = tires.car_type_id where car_type_id = 4
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tires (name, price, diameter, width, height, type, car_type_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{price}, #{diameter}, #{width}, #{height}, #{type}, (select car_type.id from car_type where car_type.id = 4))
INSERT IGNORE INTO car_type (id, car_type) VALUES (4, #{car_type})
